info.title: Pulp 3 API
info.description: Fetch, Upload, Organize, and Distribute Software Packages

get.description:
A customized named ModelViewSet that knows how to register itself with the Pulp API router.

This viewset is discoverable by its name.
"Normal" Django Models and Master/Detail models are supported by the ``register_with`` method.

Attributes:
    lookup_field (str): The name of the field by which an object should be looked up, in
        addition to any parent lookups if this ViewSet is nested. Defaults to 'pk'
    endpoint_name (str): The name of the final path segment that should identify the ViewSet's
        collection endpoint.
    nest_prefix (str): Optional prefix under which this ViewSet should be nested. This must
        correspond to the "parent_prefix" of a router with rest_framework_nested.NestedMixin.
        None indicates this ViewSet should not be nested.
    parent_lookup_kwargs (dict): Optional mapping of key names that would appear in self.kwargs
        to django model filter expressions that can be used with the corresponding value from
        self.kwargs, used only by a nested ViewSet to filter based on the parent object's
        identity.
    schema (DefaultSchema): The schema class to use by default in a viewset.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A list of fields to include in the response.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A list of fields to exclude from the response.

get.description:
The Container Distribution will serve the latest version of a Repository if
``repository`` is specified. The Container Distribution will serve a specific
repository version if ``repository_version``. Note that **either**
``repository`` or ``repository_version`` can be set on a Container
Distribution, but not both.

parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A list of fields to include in the response.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A list of fields to exclude from the response.

get.description:
Container remotes represent an external repository that implements the Container
Registry API. Container remotes support deferred downloading by configuring
the ``policy`` field.  ``on_demand`` and ``streamed`` policies can provide
significant disk space savings.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: ordering

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A list of fields to include in the response.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A list of fields to exclude from the response.

significant disk space savings.

post.description: Trigger an asynchronous task to recursively add container content.

Trigger an asynchronous task to build an OCI image from a Containerfile. A new repository version is created with the new image and tag. This API is tech preview in Pulp Container 1.1. Backwards compatibility when upgrading is not guaranteed.
Trigger an asynchronous task to copy manifests
Trigger an asynchronous task to copy tags
Trigger an async task to recursively remove container content.
Trigger an asynchronous task to sync content.
Trigger an asynchronous task to tag an image in the repository
Trigger an asynchronous task to untag an image in the repository

Artifact.description:
Base serializer for use with :class:`pulpcore.app.models.Model`

This ensures that all Serializers provide values for the 'pulp_href` field.

The class provides a default for the ``ref_name`` attribute in the
ModelSerializers's ``Meta`` class. This ensures that the OpenAPI definitions
of plugins are namespaced properly.

size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

md5.description: The MD5 checksum of the file if available.

sha1.description: The SHA-1 checksum of the file if available.

sha224.description: The SHA-224 checksum of the file if available.

sha256.description: The SHA-256 checksum of the file if available.

sha384.description: The SHA-384 checksum of the file if available.

sha512.description: The SHA-512 checksum of the file if available.

Base serializer for use with :class:`pulpcore.app.models.Model`

This ensures that all Serializers provide values for the 'pulp_href` field.

The class provides a default for the ``ref_name`` attribute in the
ModelSerializers's ``Meta`` class. This ensures that the OpenAPI definitions
of plugins are namespaced properly.

size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

md5.description: The MD5 checksum of the file if available.

sha1.description: The SHA-1 checksum of the file if available.

sha224.description: The SHA-224 checksum of the file if available.

sha256.description: The SHA-256 checksum of the file if available.

sha384.description: The SHA-384 checksum of the file if available.

sha512.description: The SHA-512 checksum of the file if available.

ContentSummary.description: Serializer for the RepositoryVersion content summary

ContentSummaryResponse.description: Serializer for the RepositoryVersion content summary

GroupProgressReportResponse.description:
Base serializer for use with :class:`pulpcore.app.models.Model`

This ensures that all Serializers provide values for the 'pulp_href` field.

The class provides a default for the ``ref_name`` attribute in the
ModelSerializers's ``Meta`` class. This ensures that the OpenAPI definitions
of plugins are namespaced properly.

message.description: The message shown to the user for the group progress report.

code.description: Identifies the type of group progress report'.

done.description: The count of items already processed. Defaults to 0.

suffix.description: The suffix to be shown with the group progress report.

task.description: A URI of the Task that ran the Import.

params.description: Any parameters that were used to create the import.

ManifestCopy.description: Serializer for copying manifests from a source repository to a destination repository.

source_repository.description: A URI of the repository to copy content from.

source_repository_version.description: A URI of the repository version to copy content from.

digests.description: A list of manifest digests to copy.

media_types.description: A list of media_types to copy.

OCIBuildImage.description:
Serializer for building an OCI container image from a Containerfile.

The Containerfile can either be specified via an artifact url, or a new file can be uploaded.
A repository must be specified, to which the container image content will be added.

containerfile_artifact.description: Artifact representing the Containerfile that should be used to run buildah.

containerfile.description: An uploaded Containerfile that should be used to run buildah.

tag.description: A tag name for the new image being built.

artifacts.description: A JSON string where each key is an artifact href and the value is it's relative path (name) inside the /pulp_working_directory of the build container executing the Containerfile.

name.description: Unique name of the file system exporter.

path.description: File system directory to store exported tar.gzs.

last_export.description: Last attempted export for this PulpExporter

repo_mapping.description: Mapping of repo names in an export file to the repo names in Pulp. For example, if the export has a repo named 'foo' and the repo to import content into was 'bar', the mapping would be "{'foo': 'bar'}".

PatchedTaskCancel.description:
Base serializer for use with :class:`pulpcore.app.models.Model`

This ensures that all Serializers provide values for the 'pulp_href` field.

The class provides a default for the ``ref_name`` attribute in the
ModelSerializers's ``Meta`` class. This ensures that the OpenAPI definitions
of plugins are namespaced properly.

state.description: The desired state of the task. Only 'canceled' is accepted.

base_path.description: The base (relative) path component of the published url. Avoid paths that                     overlap with other distribution base paths (e.g. "foo" and "foo/bar")

repository.description: The latest RepositoryVersion for this Repository will be served.

name.description: A unique name for this remote.

url.description: The URL of an external content source.

ca_cert.description: A string containing the PEM encoded CA certificate used to validate the server certificate presented by the remote server. All new line characters must be escaped.

client_cert.description: A string containing the PEM encoded client certificate used for authentication. All new line characters must be escaped.

client_key.description: A PEM encoded private key used for authentication.

tls_validation.description: If True, TLS peer validation must be performed.

username.description: The username to be used for authentication when syncing.

password.description: The password to be used for authentication when syncing.

policy.description:
immediate - All manifests and blobs are downloaded and saved during a sync.
        on_demand - Only tags and manifests are downloaded. Blobs are not
                    downloaded until they are requested for the first time by a client.
        streamed - Blobs are streamed to the client with every request and never saved.

whitelist_tags.description: A list of whitelisted tags to sync

name.description: A unique name for this repository.

ProgressReportResponse.description:
Base serializer for use with :class:`pulpcore.app.models.Model`

This ensures that all Serializers provide values for the 'pulp_href` field.

The class provides a default for the ``ref_name`` attribute in the
ModelSerializers's ``Meta`` class. This ensures that the OpenAPI definitions
of plugins are namespaced properly.

message.description: The message shown to the user for the progress report.

code.description: Identifies the type of progress report'.

state.description: The current state of the progress report. The possible values are: 'waiting', 'skipped', 'running', 'completed', 'failed' and 'canceled'. The default is 'waiting'.

done.description: The count of items already processed. Defaults to 0.

suffix.description: The suffix to be shown with the progress report.

task.description: A URI of the task that ran the Export.

full.description: Do a Full (true) or Incremental (false) export.

dry_run.description: Generate report on what would be exported and disk-space required.

versions.description: List of explicit repo-version hrefs to export (replaces current_version).

chunk_size.description: Chunk export-tarfile into pieces of chunk_size bytes.Recognizes units of B/KB/MB/GB/TB.

start_versions.description: List of explicit last-exported-repo-version hrefs (replaces last_export).

task.description: A URI of the task that ran the Export.

params.description: Any additional parameters that were used to create the export.

output_file_info.description: Dictionary of filename: sha256hash entries for export-output-file(s)

name.description: Unique name of the file system exporter.

path.description: File system directory to store exported tar.gzs.

last_export.description: Last attempted export for this PulpExporter

name.description: Unique name of the file system exporter.

path.description: File system directory to store exported tar.gzs.

last_export.description: Last attempted export for this PulpExporter

PulpImport.description: Serializer for call to import into Pulp.

path.description: Path to export that will be imported.

repo_mapping.description: Mapping of repo names in an export file to the repo names in Pulp. For example, if the export has a repo named 'foo' and the repo to import content into was 'bar', the mapping would be "{'foo': 'bar'}".

Mapping of repo names in an export file to the repo names in Pulp. For example, if the export has a repo named 'foo' and the repo to import content into was 'bar', the mapping would be "{'foo': 'bar'}".

RecursiveManage.description: Serializer for adding and removing content to/from a Container repository.

content_units.description: A list of content units to operate on.

remote.description: A URI of the repository to be synchronized.

mirror.description: If ``True``, synchronization will remove all content that is not present in the remote repository. If ``False``, sync will be additive only.

RepositoryVersion.description:
Base serializer for use with :class:`pulpcore.app.models.Model`

This ensures that all Serializers provide values for the 'pulp_href` field.

The class provides a default for the ``ref_name`` attribute in the
ModelSerializers's ``Meta`` class. This ensures that the OpenAPI definitions
of plugins are namespaced properly.

base_version.description: A repository version whose content was used as the initial set of content for this repository version

RepositoryVersionResponse.description:
Base serializer for use with :class:`pulpcore.app.models.Model`

This ensures that all Serializers provide values for the 'pulp_href` field.

The class provides a default for the ``ref_name`` attribute in the
ModelSerializers's ``Meta`` class. This ensures that the OpenAPI definitions
of plugins are namespaced properly.

base_version.description: A repository version whose content was used as the initial set of content for this repository version

content_summary.description: Various count summaries of the content in the version and the HREF to view them.

SigningServiceResponse.description: A serializer for the model declaring a signing service.

name.description: A unique name used to recognize a script.

script.description: An absolute path to a script which is going to be used for the signing.

TagCopy.description: Serializer for copying tags from a source repository to a destination repository.

source_repository.description: A URI of the repository to copy content from.

source_repository_version.description: A URI of the repository version to copy content from.

names.description: A list of tag names to copy.

TagImage.description: A serializer for parsing and validating data associated with a manifest tagging.

TaskGroupResponse.description:
Base serializer for use with :class:`pulpcore.app.models.Model`

This ensures that all Serializers provide values for the 'pulp_href` field.

The class provides a default for the ``ref_name`` attribute in the
ModelSerializers's ``Meta`` class. This ensures that the OpenAPI definitions
of plugins are namespaced properly.

description.description: A description of the task group.

all_tasks_dispatched.description: Whether all tasks have been spawned for this task group.

waiting.description: Number of tasks in the 'waiting' state

skipped.description: Number of tasks in the 'skipped' state

running.description: Number of tasks in the 'running' state

completed.description: Number of tasks in the 'completed' state

canceled.description: Number of tasks in the 'canceled' state

failed.description: Number of tasks in the 'failed' state

TaskResponse.description:
Base serializer for use with :class:`pulpcore.app.models.Model`

This ensures that all Serializers provide values for the 'pulp_href` field.

The class provides a default for the ``ref_name`` attribute in the
ModelSerializers's ``Meta`` class. This ensures that the OpenAPI definitions
of plugins are namespaced properly.

state.description: The current state of the task. The possible values include: 'waiting', 'skipped', 'running', 'completed', 'failed' and 'canceled'.

started_at.description: Timestamp of the when this task started execution.

finished_at.description: Timestamp of the when this task stopped execution.

error.description: A JSON Object of a fatal error encountered during the execution of this task.

worker.description: The worker associated with this task. This field is empty if a worker is not yet assigned.

parent_task.description: The parent task that spawned this task.

child_tasks.description: Any tasks spawned by this task.

task_group.description: The task group that this task is a member of.

UnTagImage.description: A serializer for parsing and validating data associated with a manifest untagging.

size.description: The size of the upload in bytes.

file.description: A chunk of the uploaded file.

sha256.description: The SHA-256 checksum of the chunk if available.
The expected sha256 checksum for the file.

size.description: The size of the upload in bytes.
The size of the upload in bytes.
